modName: Malukah apperance as thanks for a great song_v1_2
summary: This is my way to say a thank you for a great piece of song performed by Malukah :) The Dragonborn comes. Song belongs to Bethesda ofc and it was composed by Jeremy Soule
descriptionHtml:
Ok after some serious thoughts i made up my mind about singin bard companion mod and atm i will start to gather knowledge about that still i have some problems with npc editor cant find the source (im trying to make new npc not to modify any vanilla bard so i suppose it will take some time so stay tuned :) (any additional advices or links will be appriciated :)


Optional update

while im figuring how to make a mod i present you some new version

to get it u need additional mods:

Evening Star mod   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10984    by Favoredsoul

numenume elf ear  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13173    by itamukun 

and Field mage outfit   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198    by echo 1162

rest items used are original ingame so u probably get it anyway :)



UPDATE v1.2       hope it will looks much better now i used FB photo instead of YT

Some guys throw idea of making a bard repleacer mod with her apperance and music singin in tavern but i dont have any knowlege about making mods if any1 wanna try to make one he can use that apperance ofc :)


Updated

To Avoid any misunderstands this is a save game (begining of the game helgen keep) not mod of any kind

by some other user\'s opinions i slighty updated her apperance now in 7z file

photos for compare taken from FB and YT


Hello guys im a big fan of skyrim like everyone here i suppose :) Few weeks ago i acidently  found on YT a outstanding movie (im givin a link to compare my work to original :) ) 

http://youtu.be/4z9TdDCWN7g

Very quick this song become my favorite piece so i was thinking about apropriate way to honour  Malukah for her great work. Dunno if im not first with my idea but i wanted to try :) some ppl will like it some ofc not :P but who is concerned about them :) so i maked her apperance as female dragonborn and i hope you wil enjoy it too :)(im hoping her face is close to original as possible :D ) to play as her you need some mods :
 
ApachiiSkyHair     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168      by Apachii

Coverwomen    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563 (coverwomen look 1 to be precise)        by mrLenski for overall work and dimon99 and Lyre2r14 for textures

Covereyes     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869   (eyes 4)    by mrLenski

I hope i counted everyone :) if you have better talent to make apperances feel free to modify this savegame just credit me for making it :P thats all bye.

BY making this apperance i do !NOT! intend any abusing or offending actions aganist owner of those photos
author: GearV
